amendment.description: Amendment provides an additional $100,000,000 (by offset) for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program, restoring it to the FY 2009 level of $400,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program to a level of $100,000,000.
